citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Arrived at the facility and proceeded to the front desk requesting a facility representative for the inspection. There wasn't
any one available that was able to conduct the inspection. A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS
Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 18-May-2022.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Arrived at the facility and proceeded to the front desk requesting a facility representative for the inspection. There wasn't 
any one available that was able to conduct the inspection.  A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS 
Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 18-May-2022. 
 
 
 
End Section
